## [Experience]{.underline .smallcaps}

### Analytics Manager - Parts Pricing

Manages a team of Data Engineers and Data Scientists providing analytics and cloud system support for the Global Aftermarket Parts Pricing and Sales Variance Division. Has fulfilled the role of Data Steward for aftermarket parts pricing data. Has fulfilled the role of IT owner for key pricing systems including AWS, Snowflake, and new parts pricing system. Responsible for supporting corporate data governance and security efforts. Provides thought leadership in analytics and systems.

Primary responsibilities include automation and modernization of pricing and sales variance processes, planning and directing analytics projects, and recruiting and developing data science talent. Also, supporting and leading key multi-year data efforts in the implementation of the a new multi-million dollar pricing system. Drives system and reporting modernization.

### Senior Analytics Team Lead

Coordinates day to day Caterpillar Part Pricing Analytics activities and task management using modern DevoOps tools. Supports pricing automation efforts as well as pricing studies using the R language. Directly responsible for pricing \$75 million in annual parts sales and over 150,000 individual part numbers. Provides programming support of data engineering efforts in PySpark. Experienced creating analytic apps and dashboards with Alteryx and Tableau respectively. Coordinates parts pricing project efforts and supports personnel and resource management.

:::{.callout-note title="Key Results:"}

- Co-authored Global Parts Pricing Analytics Team Reorganization.
- Designing Parts Pricing Analytics Pricing Automation Evolution Roadmap.
- Provides team leadership in Advanced Analytics and Data Engineering.
- Interim data steward delegate and technical leader in AWS, Snowflake, R, Python, Alteryx and PowerBI.
- Leads automation and reproducible reporting efforts (i.e. AMC, TAP Insights Reporting, and more).

:::

---

### S&OP Coordinator - Analytics

Led data efforts for new forecasting system implementation. Prepared first centralized Energy & Transportation scoped hierarchical statistical forecast. Engineered first industry standard forecast accuracy metric for Energy & Transportation. Managed setup of Energy & Transportation S&OP analytics server.

:::{.callout-note title="Key Results:"}

- Led data implementation for cloud based forecasting system with external vendor.
- Implemented analytics server for increased automation and analytics.
- Championed data governance and validation processes for forecasting system and reports.
- Built consensus across industry groups for key analytics initiatives.
- Prepared centralized E&T scoped statistical forecast, driving demand forecast accuracy.
- Developed and coached S&OP Analytics Team.

:::

---

### Machine Demand Forecaster

Prepared the Demand Forecast and Long Term Forecast for mining product. Forecasted over \$3 billion in annual revenue. Mined Haver databases for leading indicators. Used these indicators in a machine learning model for mining industry sales. Developed Excel based forecasting tool for the division.

:::{.callout-note title="Key Results:"}

- Developed monthly demand forecast and annual Long Term Forecast for L&H product.
- Managed key forecast stakeholders, with competing objectives, to generate forecast consensus.
- Prepared forecast analysis for upper management in Executive S&OP meetings.
- Presented monthly to product managers on forecast changes and performance.
- Mined economic databases for leading indicators for machine learning models.
- Developed Excel/VBA based forecasting system for use across the division.

:::

### Regional Economic Analyst

Prepared the North America economic forecast proposal, including GDP, inflation, interest rate, construction and mining activity forecasts. Also prepared North American machine industry sales forecast. Supported the company business cycle monitoring processes.

### Senior Economic Analyst

Provided economic forecast proposal for the United States and Canada. Enhanced the U.S. GDP forecast through the use of chaining to ensure hierarchical forecast consistency. Authored Canada economic summary for Board of Directors meetings.

:::{.callout-note title="Key Results:"}

- Prepared North American economic forecast (GDP, CPI, PPI, interest rates, IP forecasts).
- Enhanced the U.S. GDP forecast using chaining to ensure hierarchical forecast consistency.
- Prepared North American machine industry sales forecast.
- Authored Canada economic summary for Caterpillar Board of Directors meetings.
- Managed and communicated North America PINS/market share assumptions to the organization.
- Prepared worldwide long term exchange rate forecasts.
- Supported business cycle monitoring processes and various enterprise initiatives.

:::

Responsible for the maintaining databases and monthly processes for Asia Pacific and Latin America. Assisted elsewhere as necessary.
